prophet_names.name: Muhammad
prophet_names.meaning: Praised in his being and deeds

prophet_names.name: Al-Mahi
prophet_names.meaning: He who wipes out disbelief by Allah

prophet_names.name: Al-Hasher
prophet_names.meaning: People will be resurrected at his feet

prophet_names.name: Al-Aaqib
prophet_names.meaning: The last prophet; no prophet comes after him

prophet_names.name: Al-Fatih
prophet_names.meaning: Opens the doors of goodness and guidance for people

prophet_names.name: Al-Mussaddiq
prophet_names.meaning: Confirms and believes in Allah and His Messenger

prophet_names.name: Al-Muzzammil
prophet_names.meaning: Encouraged to spend the night in worship
